barker_notes.barker_summary: Joel R. Poinsett to ---------, April 22, 1828. Notifying American merchants that Mexican Government has resolved to stop commerce between the United States and Matagorda. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 33
